card.card: { "id": 1067743, "category": { "id": 5, "parent_id": 2, "name": "动漫资讯" }, "categories": [ { "id": 2, "parent_id": 0, "name": "动画" }, { "id": 5, "parent_id": 2, "name": "动漫资讯" } ], "title": "【漫画】少女歌剧 四格漫画 BY 谷紫織", "summary": "【漫画】少女歌剧 四格漫画 BY 谷紫織 キネマシトラス公司引以为豪的动画师谷紫織先生创作的少女歌剧漫画-荞麦面很好吃呢！补档：这是2017年末开始，在少女歌剧推特上发布的来自キネマシトラス公司引以为", "banner_url": "https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/article\/4eb618cbd654c73dd18fbac9956a892686ea5cc6.jpg", "template_id": 4, "state": 0, "author": { "mid": 234441166, "name": "圣翔音乐学院放送科", "face": "https:\/\/i1.hdslb.com\/bfs\/face\/7626da8b83eb3872860f9f9c7496a8f800c480b1.jpg", "pendant": { "pid": 0, "name": "", "image": "", "expire": 0 }, "official_verify": { "type": -1, "desc": "" }, "nameplate": { "nid": 0, "name": "", "image": "", "image_small": "", "level": "", "condition": "" }, "vip": { "type": 1, "status": 0, "due_date": 0, "vip_pay_type": 0, "theme_type": 0, "label": { "path": "", "text": "", "label_theme": "" }, "avatar_subscript": 0, "nickname_color": "" } }, "reprint": 0, "image_urls": [ "https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/article\/c9d8bc2a1309d11eed54f181a0328a08a1d0685d.jpg" ], "publish_time": 1535537784, "ctime": 1535536858, "stats": { "view": 9307, "favorite": 150, "like": 358, "dislike": 0, "reply": 55, "share": 8, "coin": 83, "dynamic": 0 }, "words": 208, "dynamic": "#少女歌剧# キネマシトラス公司引以为豪的动画师谷紫織先生创作的少女歌剧漫画-荞麦面很好吃呢！\n补档：这是2017年末开始，在少女歌剧推特上发布的来自キネマシトラス公司引以为豪的动画师谷紫織先生创作的少女歌剧漫画。该系列迄今一共发布了四话内容，有着特别而独树一帜的风格。该系列漫画没有固定的更新日期，之后更新的内容将独立进行更新。", "origin_image_urls": [ "https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/article\/4eb618cbd654c73dd18fbac9956a892686ea5cc6.jpg" ], "list": null, "is_like": false, "media": { "score": 0, "media_id": 0, "title": "", "cover": "", "area": "", "type_id": 0, "type_name": "", "spoiler": 0, "season_id": 0 }, "apply_time": "", "check_time": "", "original": 0, "act_id": 0, "dispute": null, "authenMark": null, "cover_avid": 0, "top_video_info": null, "type": 0 }
